","keccak256":"0xb1970fac7b64e6c09611e6691791e848d5e3fe410fa5899e7df2e0afd77a99e3","license":"MIT"},"contracts/DailySavingsManager.sol":{"content":"// SPDX-License-Identifier: MIT
pragma solidity ^0.8.26;

import "@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC20/IERC20.sol";
import "@openzeppelin/contracts/utils/cryptography/ECDSA.sol";
import "@openzeppelin/contracts/utils/cryptography/MessageHashUtils.sol";
import "@openzeppelin/contracts/access/Ownable.sol";
import "@openzeppelin/contracts/utils/ReentrancyGuard.sol";

/**
 * @title YieldSavingsVaultWithRelayer
 * @dev A vault that automates daily savings transfers using relayers and generates yield on deposits
 */
contract YieldSavingsVaultWithRelayer is Ownable, ReentrancyGuard {
    using ECDSA for bytes32;
    using MessageHashUtils for bytes32;

    struct SavingsPlan {
        address saver;            // Person saving money
        address token;            // The token being saved
        address recipient;        // Who receives the money
        uint256 dailyAmount;      // How much to transfer each day
        uint256 startDate;        // When to start saving
        uint256 endDate;          // When to stop (0 = never)
        uint256 lastTransferDate; // When was the last transfer done
        uint256 planNumber;       // Unique identifier within user's plans
        bool isActive;            // Is this plan currently active
    }
    
    struct TokenYieldConfig {
        uint256 yearlyYieldRate;   // Yearly yield rate in basis points (1% = 100)
        uint256 lastUpdateTime;    // Last time the yield was calculated
        uint256 yieldIndex;        // Cumulative yield index (starts at 1e18)
    }

    // User balance tracking
    mapping(address => mapping(address => uint256)) public userTokenBalances;    // user => token => balance
    mapping(address => mapping(address => uint256)) public userYieldIndexes;     // user => token => yield index when last updated
    
    // Token configuration
    mapping(address => TokenYieldConfig) public tokenYieldConfigs;
    mapping(address => uint256) public totalTokenDeposits;                       // Total tokens deposited
    
    // Plan ID to plan details
    mapping(bytes32 => SavingsPlan) public savingsPlans;
    
    // Plan ID to associated extra data
    mapping(bytes32 => bytes) private _planData;
    
    // User address to array of their plan IDs
    mapping(address => bytes32[]) public userPlans;
    
    // Helpers who can update plan data on behalf of users
    mapping(address => mapping(address => bool)) public authorizedHelpers;
    
    // Authorized relayers that can execute plans
    mapping(address => bool) public authorizedRelayers;
    
    // User plan counter for unique identification
    mapping(address => uint256) public userPlanCount;
    
    // Domain separator for secure signatures
    bytes32 public immutable DOMAIN_SEPARATOR;
    
    // TypeHash for the savings plan
    bytes32 public constant PLAN_TYPEHASH = keccak256(
        "SavingsPlan(address saver,address token,address recipient,uint256 dailyAmount,uint256 startDate,uint256 endDate,uint256 planNumber)"
    );
    
    // TypeHash for helper authorization
    bytes32 public constant HELPER_TYPEHASH = keccak256(
        "Helper(address saver,address helper,bool isAuthorized,uint256 planNumber,uint256 deadline)"
    );
    
    // Execution parameters
    uint256 public dailyTransferInterval = 1 days;
    uint256 public executionWindow = 3 hours;
    
    // Constants
    uint256 public constant YIELD_INDEX_PRECISION = 1e18;
    uint256 public constant BASIS_POINTS = 10000;  // 100% in basis points
    
    // Events
    event PlanCreated(bytes32 indexed planId, address indexed saver, address recipient, uint256 dailyAmount);
    event PlanExecuted(bytes32 indexed planId, uint256 transferAmount, uint256 timestamp);
    event PlanCancelled(bytes32 indexed planId, address indexed saver);
    event HelperAuthorized(address indexed saver, address indexed helper, bool isAuthorized);
    event PlanDataUpdated(bytes32 indexed planId, bytes data);
    event TokenDeposited(address indexed user, address indexed token, uint256 amount);
    event TokenWithdrawn(address indexed user, address indexed token, uint256 amount);
    event YieldClaimed(address indexed user, address indexed token, uint256 amount);
    event YieldRateUpdated(address indexed token, uint256 newYieldRate);
    event RelayerUpdated(address indexed relayer, bool isAuthorized);
    event BatchExecutionCompleted(uint256 executedCount, uint256 timestamp);

    /**
     * @dev Sets up the contract with security parameters
     */
    constructor() Ownable(msg.sender) {
        DOMAIN_SEPARATOR = keccak256(
            abi.encode(
                keccak256("EIP712Domain(string name,string version,uint256 chainId,address verifyingContract)"),
                keccak256(bytes("YieldSavingsVaultWithRelayer")),
                keccak256(bytes("1")),
                block.chainid,
                address(this)
            )
        );
        
        // Add the deployer as an initial relayer
        authorizedRelayers[msg.sender] = true;
        emit RelayerUpdated(msg.sender, true);
    }
    
    /**
     * @dev Modifier to check if caller is an authorized relayer
     */
    modifier onlyRelayer() {
        require(authorizedRelayers[msg.sender], "Not an authorized relayer");
        _;
    }
    
    /**
     * @dev Add or remove a relayer
     * @param relayer Address of the relayer
     * @param isAuthorized Whether to authorize or remove
     */
    function setRelayer(address relayer, bool isAuthorized) external onlyOwner {
        require(relayer != address(0), "Invalid relayer address");
        authorizedRelayers[relayer] = isAuthorized;
        emit RelayerUpdated(relayer, isAuthorized);
    }
    
    /**
     * @dev Deposit tokens into the vault to earn yield
     * @param tokenAddress The token to deposit
     * @param amount How much to deposit
     */
    function deposit(address tokenAddress, uint256 amount) external nonReentrant {
        require(tokenAddress != address(0), "Invalid token");
        require(amount > 0, "Amount must be positive");
        require(tokenYieldConfigs[tokenAddress].yearlyYieldRate > 0, "Token not supported for yield");
        
        // Update yield index first
        _updateYieldIndex(tokenAddress);
        
        // Get current index
        uint256 currentIndex = tokenYieldConfigs[tokenAddress].yieldIndex;
        
        // If this is user's first deposit for this token, set their index
        if (userTokenBalances[msg.sender][tokenAddress] == 0) {
            userYieldIndexes[msg.sender][tokenAddress] = currentIndex;
        } else {
            // If they have a balance, claim pending yield first
            _claimYield(msg.sender, tokenAddress);
        }
        
        // Transfer tokens to vault
        IERC20(tokenAddress).transferFrom(msg.sender, address(this), amount);
        
        // Update balances
        userTokenBalances[msg.sender][tokenAddress] += amount;
        totalTokenDeposits[tokenAddress] += amount;
        
        emit TokenDeposited(msg.sender, tokenAddress, amount);
    }
    
    /**
     * @dev Withdraw tokens from the vault
     * @param tokenAddress The token to withdraw
     * @param amount How much to withdraw
     */
    function withdraw(address tokenAddress, uint256 amount) external nonReentrant {
        require(amount > 0, "Amount must be positive");
        require(userTokenBalances[msg.sender][tokenAddress] >= amount, "Insufficient balance");
        
        // Claim any pending yield first
        _updateYieldIndex(tokenAddress);
        _claimYield(msg.sender, tokenAddress);
        
        // Update balances
        userTokenBalances[msg.sender][tokenAddress] -= amount;
        totalTokenDeposits[tokenAddress] -= amount;
        
        // Transfer tokens back to user
        IERC20(tokenAddress).transfer(msg.sender, amount);
        
        emit TokenWithdrawn(msg.sender, tokenAddress, amount);
    }
    
    /**
     * @dev Claim accumulated yield
     * @param tokenAddress Token to claim yield for
     */
    function claimYield(address tokenAddress) external nonReentrant {
        _updateYieldIndex(tokenAddress);
        _claimYield(msg.sender, tokenAddress);
    }
    
    /**
     * @dev Create a savings plan with your signature
     * @param tokenAddress The token you want to save
     * @param recipientAddress Who receives the savings
     * @param dailyAmount How much to save each day
     * @param startDate When to start saving
     * @param endDate When to stop saving (0 = never)
     * @param signature Your signature confirming this plan
     * @param extraData Any additional data for this plan
     * @return planId The ID of the created plan
     */
    function createPlanWithSignature(
        address tokenAddress,
        address recipientAddress,
        uint256 dailyAmount,
        uint256 startDate,
        uint256 endDate,
        bytes calldata signature,
        bytes calldata extraData
    ) external returns (bytes32 planId) {
        require(tokenAddress != address(0), "Invalid token");
        require(recipientAddress != address(0), "Invalid recipient");
        require(dailyAmount > 0, "Amount must be positive");
        
        // Get this user's next plan number
        uint256 planNumber = userPlanCount[msg.sender]++;
        
        // Create a unique ID for this plan
        planId = _hashPlan(
            msg.sender,
            tokenAddress,
            recipientAddress,
            dailyAmount,
            startDate,
            endDate,
            planNumber
        );
        
        // Verify the signature
        address signer = _verifyPlanSignature(planId, signature);
        require(signer == msg.sender, "Invalid signature");
        
        // Create the savings plan
        SavingsPlan memory plan = SavingsPlan({
            saver: msg.sender,
            token: tokenAddress,
            recipient: recipientAddress,
            dailyAmount: dailyAmount,
            startDate: startDate > block.timestamp ? startDate : block.timestamp,
            endDate: endDate,
            lastTransferDate: block.timestamp,
            planNumber: planNumber,
            isActive: true
        });
        
        savingsPlans[planId] = plan;
        userPlans[msg.sender].push(planId);
        
        // Store any extra data
        if (extraData.length > 0) {
            _planData[planId] = extraData;
            emit PlanDataUpdated(planId, extraData);
        }
        
        // Ensure token has a yield configuration (even if it's 0%)
        if (tokenYieldConfigs[tokenAddress].yieldIndex == 0) {
            tokenYieldConfigs[tokenAddress] = TokenYieldConfig({
                yearlyYieldRate: 0,
                lastUpdateTime: block.timestamp,
                yieldIndex: YIELD_INDEX_PRECISION
            });
        }
        
        emit PlanCreated(planId, msg.sender, recipientAddress, dailyAmount);
    }
    
    /**
     * @dev Create a savings plan directly (no signature needed)
     * @param tokenAddress The token you want to save
     * @param recipientAddress Who receives the savings
     * @param dailyAmount How much to save each day
     * @param startDate When to start saving
     * @param endDate When to stop saving (0 = never)
     * @param extraData Any additional data for this plan
     * @return planId The ID of your new savings plan
     */
    function createPlan(
        address tokenAddress,
        address recipientAddress,
        uint256 dailyAmount,
        uint256 startDate,
        uint256 endDate,
        bytes calldata extraData
    ) external returns (bytes32 planId) {
        require(tokenAddress != address(0), "Invalid token");
        require(recipientAddress != address(0), "Invalid recipient");
        require(dailyAmount > 0, "Amount must be positive");
        
        // Get next plan number for this user
        uint256 planNumber = userPlanCount[msg.sender]++;
        
        // Create plan ID
        planId = _hashPlan(
            msg.sender,
            tokenAddress,
            recipientAddress,
            dailyAmount,
            startDate,
            endDate,
            planNumber
        );
        
        // Create the savings plan
        SavingsPlan memory plan = SavingsPlan({
            saver: msg.sender,
            token: tokenAddress,
            recipient: recipientAddress,
            dailyAmount: dailyAmount,
            startDate: startDate > block.timestamp ? startDate : block.timestamp,
            endDate: endDate,
            lastTransferDate: block.timestamp,
            planNumber: planNumber,
            isActive: true
        });
        
        savingsPlans[planId] = plan;
        userPlans[msg.sender].push(planId);
        
        // Store any extra data
        if (extraData.length > 0) {
            _planData[planId] = extraData;
            emit PlanDataUpdated(planId, extraData);
        }
        
        // Ensure token has a yield configuration (even if it's 0%)
        if (tokenYieldConfigs[tokenAddress].yieldIndex == 0) {
            tokenYieldConfigs[tokenAddress] = TokenYieldConfig({
                yearlyYieldRate: 0,
                lastUpdateTime: block.timestamp,
                yieldIndex: YIELD_INDEX_PRECISION
            });
        }
        
        emit PlanCreated(planId, msg.sender, recipientAddress, dailyAmount);
    }
    
    /**
     * @dev Set yield rate for a token (owner only)
     * @param tokenAddress The token to configure
     * @param yearlyYieldRate Annual yield rate in basis points (e.g., 500 = 5%)
     */
    function setTokenYieldRate(address tokenAddress, uint256 yearlyYieldRate) external onlyOwner {
        require(tokenAddress != address(0), "Invalid token");
        require(yearlyYieldRate <= 10000, "Rate too high"); // Max 100%
        
        // Update index before changing rate
        _updateYieldIndex(tokenAddress);
        
        // If this is a new token, initialize its config
        if (tokenYieldConfigs[tokenAddress].yieldIndex == 0) {
            tokenYieldConfigs[tokenAddress] = TokenYieldConfig({
                yearlyYieldRate: yearlyYieldRate,
                lastUpdateTime: block.timestamp,
                yieldIndex: YIELD_INDEX_PRECISION
            });
        } else {
            // Update existing token's yield rate
            tokenYieldConfigs[tokenAddress].yearlyYieldRate = yearlyYieldRate;
        }
        
        emit YieldRateUpdated(tokenAddress, yearlyYieldRate);
    }
    
    /**
     * @dev Execute a specific plan (relayer or owner only)
     * @param planId Plan ID to execute
     * @return success Whether execution was successful
     */
    function executePlan(bytes32 planId) external onlyRelayer returns (bool success) {
        SavingsPlan storage plan = savingsPlans[planId];
        
        if (_isPlanReadyForTransfer(plan)) {
            _executePlan(planId);
            return true;
        }
        
        return false;
    }
    
    /**
     * @dev Execute multiple plans at once (relayer only)
     * @param planIds Array of plan IDs to execute
     * @return executedCount Number of successfully executed plans
     */
    function executePlans(bytes32[] calldata planIds) external onlyRelayer returns (uint256 executedCount) {
        executedCount = 0;
        
        for (uint i = 0; i < planIds.length; i++) {
            SavingsPlan storage plan = savingsPlans[planIds[i]];
            
            if (_isPlanReadyForTransfer(plan)) {
                _executePlan(planIds[i]);
                executedCount++;
            }
        }
        
        emit BatchExecutionCompleted(executedCount, block.timestamp);
    }
    
    /**
     * @dev Get executable plans for a token (relayer only)
     * @param tokenAddress Token address to filter by
     * @param maxResults Maximum number of results to return
     * @return planIds Array of executable plan IDs
     */
    function getExecutablePlans(address tokenAddress, uint256 maxResults) 
        external 
        view 
        onlyRelayer 
        returns (bytes32[] memory planIds) 
    {
        // Create fixed-size array for results
        bytes32[] memory results = new bytes32[](maxResults);
        uint256 count = 0;
        
        // This implementation is simplified and should be optimized in production
        address[] memory savers = _getActiveSavers();
        
        for (uint i = 0; i < savers.length && count < maxResults; i++) {
            bytes32[] memory saverPlans = userPlans[savers[i]];
            
            for (uint j = 0; j < saverPlans.length && count < maxResults; j++) {
                bytes32 planId = saverPlans[j];
                SavingsPlan storage plan = savingsPlans[planId];
                
                if (_isPlanReadyForTransfer(plan) && 
                    (tokenAddress == address(0) || plan.token == tokenAddress)) {
                    results[count] = planId;
                    count++;
                }
            }
        }
        
        // Create right-sized array with just the results
        planIds = new bytes32[](count);
        for (uint i = 0; i < count; i++) {
            planIds[i] = results[i];
        }
        
        return planIds;
    }
    
    /**
     * @dev Internal function to update yield index for a token
     * @param tokenAddress Token to update
     */
    function _updateYieldIndex(address tokenAddress) internal {
        TokenYieldConfig storage config = tokenYieldConfigs[tokenAddress];
        
        // If token not configured or no time has passed, skip
        if (config.yieldIndex == 0 || block.timestamp <= config.lastUpdateTime) {
            return;
        }
        
        // Calculate time elapsed since last update
        uint256 timeElapsed = block.timestamp - config.lastUpdateTime;
        
        // Calculate new index
        if (config.yearlyYieldRate > 0 && timeElapsed > 0) {
            // Calculate yield for the period
            // Formula: current_index * (1 + (yield_rate * time_elapsed) / (365 days * 10000))
            uint256 yearInSeconds = 365 days;
            uint256 yieldFactor = config.yearlyYieldRate * timeElapsed;
            uint256 denominator = yearInSeconds * BASIS_POINTS;
            
            // Calculate yield with precision
            uint256 indexDelta = (config.yieldIndex * yieldFactor) / denominator;
            config.yieldIndex += indexDelta;
        }
        
        // Update last update time
        config.lastUpdateTime = block.timestamp;
    }
    
    /**
     * @dev Internal function to claim yield for a user
     * @param user User address
     * @param tokenAddress Token address
     */
    function _claimYield(address user, address tokenAddress) internal {
        TokenYieldConfig storage config = tokenYieldConfigs[tokenAddress];
        uint256 userBalance = userTokenBalances[user][tokenAddress];
        
        // If user has no balance or token not configured, return
        if (userBalance == 0 || config.yieldIndex == 0) {
            return;
        }
        
        uint256 userIndex = userYieldIndexes[user][tokenAddress];
        if (userIndex == 0) {
            // If user index not initialized, set it to current index
            userYieldIndexes[user][tokenAddress] = config.yieldIndex;
            return;
        }
        
        if (config.yieldIndex <= userIndex) {
            return; // No yield to claim
        }
        
        // Calculate yield amount
        // Formula: balance * (current_index - user_index) / PRECISION
        uint256 yieldAmount = (userBalance * (config.yieldIndex - userIndex)) / YIELD_INDEX_PRECISION;
        
        if (yieldAmount > 0) {
            // Update user's index
            userYieldIndexes[user][tokenAddress] = config.yieldIndex;
            
            // Add yield to user's balance
            userTokenBalances[user][tokenAddress] += yieldAmount;
            
            emit YieldClaimed(user, tokenAddress, yieldAmount);
        }
    }
    
    /**
     * @dev Authorize someone to help manage your plans
     * @param helper Address of the helper
     * @param isAuthorized Whether to authorize or remove authorization
     */
    function authorizeHelper(address helper, bool isAuthorized) external {
        authorizedHelpers[msg.sender][helper] = isAuthorized;
        emit HelperAuthorized(msg.sender, helper, isAuthorized);
    }
    
    /**
     * @dev Update extra data for a savings plan
     * @param planId ID of the plan to update
     * @param data New data to store
     */
    function updatePlanData(bytes32 planId, bytes calldata data) external {
        SavingsPlan storage plan = savingsPlans[planId];
        
        require(plan.saver != address(0), "Plan doesn't exist");
        require(
            msg.sender == plan.saver || authorizedHelpers[plan.saver][msg.sender],
            "Not authorized"
        );
        
        _planData[planId] = data;
        emit PlanDataUpdated(planId, data);
    }
    
    /**
     * @dev Cancel a savings plan
     * @param planId ID of the plan to cancel
     */
    function cancelPlan(bytes32 planId) external {
        SavingsPlan storage plan = savingsPlans[planId];
        
        require(plan.saver != address(0), "Plan doesn't exist");
        require(msg.sender == plan.saver, "Not your plan");
        require(plan.isActive, "Plan already inactive");
        
        plan.isActive = false;
        
        // Store cancellation data
        bytes memory cancelData = abi.encode("CANCELLED", block.timestamp);
        _planData[planId] = cancelData;
        
        emit PlanCancelled(planId, msg.sender);
        emit PlanDataUpdated(planId, cancelData);
    }
    
    /**
     * @dev Update execution parameters (owner only)
     * @param newDailyInterval New interval between executions
     * @param newExecutionWindow New execution window after interval
     */
    function setExecutionParameters(uint256 newDailyInterval, uint256 newExecutionWindow) external onlyOwner {
        require(newDailyInterval >= 1 hours, "Interval too short");
        require(newExecutionWindow <= newDailyInterval, "Window exceeds interval");
        
        dailyTransferInterval = newDailyInterval;
        executionWindow = newExecutionWindow;
    }
    
    /**
     * @dev Internal function to execute a savings plan
     * @param planId ID of the plan to execute
     */
    function _executePlan(bytes32 planId) internal {
        SavingsPlan storage plan = savingsPlans[planId];
        
        if (!_isPlanReadyForTransfer(plan)) {
            return;
        }
        
        // Check if plan has been cancelled via data
        bytes memory data = _planData[planId];
        if (data.length >= 32) {
            // Check for cancellation
            bytes32 firstWord;
            assembly {
                firstWord := mload(add(data, 32))
            }
            if (firstWord == keccak256("CANCELLED")) {
                return;
            }
        }
        
        // Check if user has enough balance in vault
        // First, update yield to ensure user has latest balance
        _updateYieldIndex(plan.token);
        _claimYield(plan.saver, plan.token);
        
        if (userTokenBalances[plan.saver][plan.token] < plan.dailyAmount) {
            return; // Not enough balance
        }
        
        // Mark plan as executed
        plan.lastTransferDate = block.timestamp;
        
        // Update balances - deduct from user's balance in vault
        userTokenBalances[plan.saver][plan.token] -= plan.dailyAmount;
        
        // Add to recipient's balance if they are also a vault user
        if (userYieldIndexes[plan.recipient][plan.token] > 0) {
            userTokenBalances[plan.recipient][plan.token] += plan.dailyAmount;
        } else {
            // Otherwise send tokens to recipient
            IERC20(plan.token).transfer(plan.recipient, plan.dailyAmount);
            totalTokenDeposits[plan.token] -= plan.dailyAmount;
        }
        
        emit PlanExecuted(planId, plan.dailyAmount, block.timestamp);
    }
    
    /**
     * @dev Check if a plan is ready for transfer
     * @param plan The plan to check
     * @return isReady Whether the plan is ready for transfer
     */
    function _isPlanReadyForTransfer(SavingsPlan storage plan) internal view returns (bool) {
        return (
            plan.isActive && 
            block.timestamp >= plan.startDate && 
            (plan.endDate == 0 || block.timestamp <= plan.endDate) &&
            block.timestamp >= plan.lastTransferDate + dailyTransferInterval - executionWindow
        );
    }
    
    /**
     * @dev Create a unique hash for a savings plan
     */
    function _hashPlan(
        address saver,
        address token,
        address recipient,
        uint256 dailyAmount,
        uint256 startDate,
        uint256 endDate,
        uint256 planNumber
    ) internal view returns (bytes32) {
        bytes32 structHash = keccak256(
            abi.encode(
                PLAN_TYPEHASH,
                saver,
                token,
                recipient,
                dailyAmount,
                startDate,
                endDate,
                planNumber
            )
        );
        
        return keccak256(
            abi.encodePacked("\x19\x01", DOMAIN_SEPARATOR, structHash)
        );
    }
    
    /**
     * @dev Verify a signature for a savings plan
     * @param planId Hash of the plan
     * @param signature Signature to verify
     * @return signer Address that signed the plan
     */
    function _verifyPlanSignature(bytes32 planId, bytes calldata signature) internal pure returns (address) {
        return planId.toEthSignedMessageHash().recover(signature);
    }
    
    /**
     * @dev Get list of active savers
     * @return savers Array of active saver addresses
     */
    function _getActiveSavers() internal view returns (address[] memory) {
        // In a real implementation, you would track active savers efficiently
        // This is simplified for demonstration purposes
        address[] memory savers = new address[](1);
        savers[0] = address(0); // Placeholder
        return savers;
    }
    
    /**
     * @dev Get all plans for a specific saver
     * @param saver Saver's address
     * @return planIds Array of plan IDs
     */
    function getSaverPlans(address saver) external view returns (bytes32[] memory) {
        return userPlans[saver];
    }
    
    /**
     * @dev Get details for a specific plan
     * @param planId ID of the plan
     * @return plan Plan details
     */
    function getPlan(bytes32 planId) external view returns (SavingsPlan memory) {
        return savingsPlans[planId];
    }
    
    /**
     * @dev Get user's token balance including pending yield
     * @param user User address
     * @param tokenAddress Token address
     * @return balance User's total balance including pending yield
     */
    function getUserTotalBalance(address user, address tokenAddress) external view returns (uint256) {
        uint256 baseBalance = userTokenBalances[user][tokenAddress];
        if (baseBalance == 0) return 0;
        
        TokenYieldConfig memory config = tokenYieldConfigs[tokenAddress];
        uint256 userIndex = userYieldIndexes[user][tokenAddress];
        
        // If no index or no yield, return base balance
        if (userIndex == 0 || config.yieldIndex <= userIndex) {
            return baseBalance;
        }
        
        // Calculate yield based on current index
        uint256 pendingYield = (baseBalance * (config.yieldIndex - userIndex)) / YIELD_INDEX_PRECISION;
        return baseBalance + pendingYield;
    }
    
    /**
     * @dev Get current yield rate for a token
     * @param tokenAddress Token address
     * @return rate Annual yield rate in basis points
     */
    function getTokenYieldRate(address tokenAddress) external view returns (uint256) {
        return tokenYieldConfigs[tokenAddress].yearlyYieldRate;
    }
    
    /**
     * @dev Calculate pending yield for a user
     * @param user User address
     * @param tokenAddress Token address
     * @return pendingYield Amount of pending yield
     */
    function getPendingYield(address user, address tokenAddress) external view returns (uint256) {
        uint256 baseBalance = userTokenBalances[user][tokenAddress];
        if (baseBalance == 0) return 0;
        
        TokenYieldConfig memory config = tokenYieldConfigs[tokenAddress];
        uint256 userIndex = userYieldIndexes[user][tokenAddress];
        
        if (userIndex == 0 || config.yieldIndex <= userIndex) {
            return 0;
        }
        
        // Calculate current index including time since last update
        uint256 currentIndex = config.yieldIndex;
        if (block.timestamp > config.lastUpdateTime && config.yearlyYieldRate > 0) {
            uint256 timeElapsed = block.timestamp - config.lastUpdateTime;
            uint256 yearInSeconds = 365 days;
            uint256 yieldFactor = config.yearlyYieldRate * timeElapsed;
            uint256 denominator = yearInSeconds * BASIS_POINTS;
            uint256 indexDelta = (currentIndex * yieldFactor) / denominator;
            currentIndex += indexDelta;
        }
        
        // Calculate yield based on current index
        return (baseBalance * (currentIndex - userIndex)) / YIELD_INDEX_PRECISION;
    }
